#number of gps events 287
#This timing reconstruction was run at time dd-mm-yy hh:mm:ss (UTC):
#11-07-2014 01:21:10

#Results of linear fitting for every fad counter: a + b * cnt = time

#Residual timing error after correction
#determined by bootstrapping with a random 1/3 of the gps events
#(this random 1/3 was NOT used in fitting)
#Theoretical result:
#0.0  4.564e-6
###mean_dt   sigma_dt
##-2.92209e-07    4.16892e-06
#
#
#Timing x-checks:
#Bootstrapped |Mean Delta T| < 5e-6s && |Sigma Delta T| < 10e-6s ? -> YES, PASSED
#All p-values >= 0.0001 ? -> YES, PASSED
#All toothgaps found? -> YES, PASSED
